text: Keetia purpurascens is a species of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania. == Sources == * Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Keetia purpurascens. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Endemic flora of Tanzania Category:Keetia Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Keetia purpurascens
